title: Lead Frontend Developer - Ari Company
content:
I was a leading developer in the development of a marketplace (https://leedex.eu/). For this project I used: Html, SCSS, JavaScript (ES6+), Vue 2, Nuxt , Vuetify, Rest Api, Axios,
Figma, Git, Trello etc

title: Frontend Developer - Zoiex Technologies
content:
I have developed a pwa application for auto trading. Using stack: Vue.js, Vuetify,Vuex, VueRouter,Firebase, PWA, WebAuth, Pug, sass/scss, Gitlab, Trello etc. I also completely developed the admin panel for this application with complex charts and
calculators for trading

title: Frontend Developer - Filancy Marketing
content:
Development and support of web applications on Vue.js / Nuxt.js. Designed from scratch (Html/css/jquery) a website for searching for air tickets. Website in two
languages (English and Hebrew).

title: Web Developer - FluidWeb
content: Creation of sites on Wordpress / Support / transfer, domain connection, hosting settings Functional improvements and bug fixes, Website adaptation for mobile devices Adding new features (using JS/jQuery)
